title: Synth-MIA: A Testbed for Auditing Privacy Leakage in Tabular Data Synthesis
summary: This paper introduces Synth-MIA, a testbed for auditing privacy leakage in tabular data synthesis, addressing challenges in evaluating empirical privacy of tabular generative models and the limitations of existing Membership Inference Attacks.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper deals with "synthetic datasets" and "tabular data synthesis", which are forms of "contextual datasets". It's not directly about spatio-temporal point processes or survey data, but the creation and analysis of contextual data is relevant.
